data.name: AliceIntroDescription
data.value: The key of the puzzle is to be like a trouble!

data.name: AliceShortDescription
data.value: Be KILLED by an IMPOSTOR or be the last stand

data.name: AliceFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION 1: Be KILLED by an IMPOSTOR MISSION 2: Be the last two alive and the other player is NOT a NEUTRAL role *Being KILLed by other teams/players exept Impostors does not achieve MISSION 1. *If you get EXILED in a meeting, you will lose the game. "MISCHIEF" : Don't let the tasks end! - Decreases everyone's task completetion and adds a new task to be cleared additionally. Beware for both IMPOSTORS and CREWMATES because you're a strong role!

data.name: JackalUpgradeSidekickNum
data.value: No. of Sidekicks promoting on Jackal's death

data.name: JackalCanSeeImpostorToSidekickImpostor
data.value: Does show Sidekicked-Impostors as an Impostor

data.name: SidekickHasOtherKillCool
data.value: Sidekicks: Does have a modified Kill Cooldown

data.name: SidekickHasOtherKillRange
data.value: Sidekicks: Does have a modified Kill Distance

data.name: SidekickApplyEnvironmentVisionEffect
data.value: Sidekicks: Does sabotage effect their vision

data.name: JackalIntroDescription
data.value: It's OUR time to take over this ship!

data.name: JackalShortDescription
data.value: Be the last stand with your Sidekick

data.name: JackalFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability "SIDEKICK" : Turns a player into your sidekick! - Fully overwrites their former role, and changes into a "Sidekick" - "LOVERS" may have some specific settings when sidekick-ed, please check your game configuration

data.name: SidekickShortDescription
data.value: Assist your Jackal and achive victory

data.name: SidekickFullDescription
data.value:
Your Jackal: "{0}"
A NEUTRAL role with the mission to assist your Jackal! MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability. When your Jackal is eliminated from the game, your role may promote and may change to a new Jackal.

data.name: TaskMasterIntroDescription
data.value: I have the duty to complete all tasks!

data.name: TaskMasterFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Complete all tasks before your death / the game ends When you die before you complete all the tasks, you cannot achive your mission, unlike the SURVIVOR. A set amount of additional tasks will be added after you cleared all the set global tasks.

data.name: MissionaryTellDeparture
data.value: Can Missionary know when a player suicides

data.name: MissionaryIntroDescription
data.value: Lead the crew to the heaven of truce

data.name: MissionaryFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role with the ability "PROPAGATE". MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability. "PROPAGATE" : Lets a player die after a random count. - Any player who is propagated will die/suicide ("Departure") after a random count. - The count will be set randomly between the max and min time configuration. - Departure can even take place while meetings.
<When Enabled> "CONDUCT" : Propagation but with a quick effect. - Occurs when targeting a player who you voted in a meeting with PROPAGATE - Immediately lets the targeted player die - The game adds targetable players in a "Target list". No players can be added over the set limit; When the list is full, at least one player on the list must be eliminated from the game to add a new player as a target.

data.name: departureText
data.value: Another wanderer found the heavens' ladder.

data.name: JesterIntroDescription
data.value: HIPPITY HOPPITY THE MEETING IS MY PROPERTY!

data.name: JesterShortDescription
data.value: Bring chaos to the ship and be EXILED

data.name: JesterFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achieve. MISSION : Be exiled to win. *STATS may show the Jester as alive from game latencies/lags. "OUTBURST" : Triggers targeted player's KILL after a set timer. - Can use this ability on any player, with our without the KILL ability. - Fails to trigger KILL when : 1. The targeted player does not have the ability KILL 2. No player is in range of the targeted player 3. The triggered KILL is targeted to you (The JESTER who used the OUTBURST ability)

data.name: YandereTargetKilledKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Kill Cooldown reduction when Killing a OBSTACLE

data.name: YandereNoneTargetKilledKillCoolMultiplier
data.value: Kill Cooldown penalty when Killing a normal player

data.name: YandereBlockTargetTime
data.value: Players will counted as OBSTACLES from

data.name: YandereSetTargetTime
data.value: Counts player as an OBSTACLE after

data.name: YandereRunawayTime
data.value: After OBSTACLES are all dead,\nturns into STAMPEDE MODE in:

data.name: YandereHasOneSidedArrow
data.value: Does show arrows to your SWEETIE

data.name: YandereHasTargetArrow
data.value: Does show arrows to your OBSTACLES

data.name: YandereFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role who wants to KILL all other living players exept your SWEETIE. MISSION 1 : Achive victory with your "SWEETIE" - You need to meet several conditions: 1. Your SWEETIE is alive 2. Eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with abilities to eliminate players (i.e. KILL, PROPAGATE) exept your SWEETIE. 3. All other alive members are on your team / is your SWEETIE MISSION 2 : Become the last two in the ship, and the other player does not have abilities to KILL or make you die. NOTE: Both missions does not count the ASSASIN as a "harmful" player, if the ASSASIN cannot be KILLed by its options.
"SWEETIE" : When the game starts, a player will randomly set as your "SWEETIE". When any other player stays for a set duration, the player will be count as a "OBSTACLE". When there is one or more OBSTACLEs alive, you will able to use the KILL ability.
<When KILLing OBSTACLEs> - your Kill Cooldown will have a massive reduction - when there are no more OBSTACLEs alive, you lose your KILL ability until there is a new OBSTACLE. <When KILLing other players exept OBSTACLEs> - an adittional cooldown will be added to your KILL. (can be multiplied) Any Kill Cooldown change will be reset after any meeting.
"STAMPEDE MODE" : Your KILL ability can be used while this mode, not regarding OBSTACLEs alive. You enter this mode when: - There is no new OBSTACLEs added for a set duration - Your SWEETIE is no more alive

data.name: YandereShipJustForTwo
data.value: The Yandere wins with true love....

data.name: YokoShortDescription
data.value: Keep alive and steal the glory

data.name: TotocalcioShortDescription
data.value: Bet to a player and lead them to victory

data.name: TotocalcioFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: BET to a player, and let the player win the game! "BET": Bet your chips to the targeted player! - Only targets one player - A green mark will show up on their player name when you've BET - When the targeted player wins the game, you will too! - The ability cooldown will be longer depending on the number of remaining players
*Some NEUTRAL victories cannot be applied: - Youko - Vigirante

data.name: loseNow
data.value: I'm sure I'm going to lose now…

data.name: MinerNoneActiveTime
data.value: "LANDMINE" : Cooldown until Landmine activation after game start / meetings

data.name: MinerCanShowNoneActiveAnotherPlayer
data.value: Can other players know the Landmine before activation

data.name: MinerShowKillLog
data.value: Does show alert of Landmine deaths

data.name: MinerShortDescription
data.value: BLAST all your mates with LANDMINES

data.name: MinerFullDescription
data.value:
A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability.
"LANDMINE" : Sets a Landmine on your position. - The Landmine blows up one player within a set range. This includes the Miner itself. - The Landmine activates after a set cooldown after ability usage, and after initial game start / each meetings. Don't forget your mine and blow up yourself! - After activation, the Landmine will be removed/nullified. - The "Kill log" is only a flavor text and has no specific meaning besides Landmine activation. - You can warp between all VENTs when the corresponding option is enabled!

data.name: EaterKillEatActiveCoolTimeReduceRate
data.value: "EAT/VORE" : Reduction rate of cooldown \nafter meetings without eating any players

data.name: EaterIsShowArrowForDeadBody
data.value: Does show arrows to dead bodies

data.name: EaterShortDescription
data.value: Eat mates and foes, dead or alive

data.name: EaterFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: EAT and VORE a set amount of players/dead bodies. "EAT" : Eats and deletes dead bodies. - Multiplies and adds penalty for "VORE" ability cooldown on body consumption for a set rate. "VORE" : Vores and eliminates a player nearby. - Can be used while a player is near you - After a set duration, the targeted player will be erased/vored, nullifying any kind of barriers or guards! - Multiplies and adds penalty for "VORE" and "EAT" ability cooldown on player consumption for a set rate. *Both "EAT" and "VORE" recieves a cooldown reduction when a meeting occurs, if it takes place before using the ability for the first time in the turn.

data.name: QueenServantKillKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Queen: Kill Cooldown reduction rate by Servants' KILL

data.name: QueenServantTaskKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Queen: Kill Cooldown reduction rate by Servants' tasks completion

data.name: QueenServantTaskCompKillCoolReduceRate
data.value: Queen: Passive Kill Cooldown reduction rate by\nServants' tasks full completion

data.name: QueenIntroDescription
data.value: It's the time to make our Kingdom!

data.name: QueenShortDescription
data.value: CHARM players and be the last stand

data.name: QueenFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive GLORY. MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability "CHARM" : Charms and draws a player into your team! I. When a CREWMATE or IMPOSTOR is targeted: - Adds the role "Servant" to the player. This does NOT erase the f ormer role; Their roles and role abilities will be carried on. - CREWMATE-Servants will gain tasks when they have no initial tasks (i.e. Merlins) - IMPOSTOR-Servants will able to use KILL, VENT and SABOTAGE II. When a NEUTRAL is targeted: - CHANGES the player's role into "Servant". This DOES erase the former role. - The ability to KILL, VENT or SABOTAGE will be carried on, depending on the former neutral role. - The player will gain tasks when they have no initial tasks. *By your Servants' tasks and KILLs, you will gain reductions on KILL cooldowns! *On Queen's death, the Servants will die too.

data.name: ServantFullDescription
data.value:
Your Queen: {0}
A NEUTRAL role with the mission to support your majesty! MISSION: Halve the remaining players with your own team, and eliminate all other IMPOSTORS / NEUTRALS with the KILL ability *You will die when your Queen dies, protect her majesty at no costs! "KILL FLASH" : You can know a KILL taking place by a white/green flash. - White flashes means your QUEEN has used KILL - Green flashes means somebody else has used KILL "SUICIDE" : Simply kills yourself.

data.name: MadmateSeeImpostorTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate for Madmates to know Impostors

data.name: MadmateCanSeeFromImpostorTaskGage
data.value: Task completion rate for Impostors to know Madmates

data.name: MadmateIsDontCountAliveCrew
data.value: Does not count Madmates as "Alive" crewmates

data.name: MadmateFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Achive IMPOSTOR victory (including extra-wins) "SUICIDE" : Simply kills yourself. *Clearing a set amount of tasks can reveal your role to Impostors, when "Can Impostors know Madmates" is on.

data.name: UmbrerFullDescription
data.value: A NEUTRAL role with a unique mission to achive victory. MISSION: Infect all players "INJECTION" : Infects targeted player after a set duration. - Can be used on a non-infected player, and changes them into "Infected players". "VITALIZE" : Vitalizes viruses and spreads infection! - Can be used on a Infected player, and activates "Virus spreading" mode - A "Virus spreading" player infects one nearby player. - By infecting a nearby player or after a set duration, "Virus spreading" mode deactivates.
